Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    Ball Model Object.

    Represents the ball which will move around inside the container.

    Various attributes of the ball, and related behavior.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball(double x, double y, double radius, int speed, int direction)
      Constructor for public class Ball.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getRadius() 
      double getX() 
      double getxDelta() 
      double getY() 
      double getyDelta() 
      void move()
      Moves the ball one step.
      void reflectHorizontal()
      Reflects ball horizontally (ball hits vertical wall).
      void reflectVertical()
      Reflects ball vertically (ball hits horizontal wall).
      void setRadius(double radius)
      Sets the radius of the ball to the user defined value.
      void setX(double x)
      Sets the abscissa of the ball's center to the user defined value.
      void setxDelta(double xDelta)
      Sets the velocity of the ball in x-direction (in pixels per step) to the user defined value.
      void setY(double y)
      Sets the ordinate of the ball's center to the user defined value.
      void setyDelta(double yDelta)
      Sets the velocity of the ball in y-direction (in pixels per step) to the user defined value.
      java.lang.String toString()
      String converter for ball position and velocity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(double x,
    double y,
    double radius,
    int speed,
    int direction)
        Constructor for public class Ball.
        Parameters:
        x - abscissa of the ball's center.
        y - ordinate of the ball's center.
        radius - radius of the ball. Cannot be negative or zero.
        speed - speed of the ball defined in pixels per step.
        direction - direction of the ball's movement. Specified in degrees from -180 to +180.

      • setyDelta

        public void setyDelta(double yDelta)
        Sets the velocity of the ball in y-direction (in pixels per step) to the user defined value.
        Parameters:
        yDelta - velocity of the ball in y-direction (in pixels per step).

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves the ball one step.

        Changes the position of the ball's center after one step.

      • reflectHorizontal

        public void reflectHorizontal()
        Reflects ball horizontally (ball hits vertical wall).

        Velocity in x-direction reversed, velocity in y-direction unchanged.

      • reflectVertical

        public void reflectVertical()
        Reflects ball vertically (ball hits horizontal wall).

        Velocity in y-direction reversed, velocity in x-direction unchanged

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String converter for ball position and velocity.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string containing position and velocity of the ball.
